****************************
SPHtmlHelp for Delphi 6,7 v 1.3
****************************

Delphi6,7 has new Interface called ICustomHelpViewer that should be used to install additional Help Viewers.

SPHtmlHelp.pas has implementation of HTMLHelp Viewer Interface that launches HTML Help files (*.chm).

INSTALLATION
Just place the SPHtmlHelp into Uses clause and Define Application.Helpfile (must be a a valid *.CHM file)!

Don't forget to define the library path to SPHTMLHelp.pas or copy SPHTMLHelp.pas to the project's folder.
